post.description: Endpoint for sending an email notification to one or more recipient.

example.subject: Important notification regarding your organization, $recipientName$
example.body: Dear $recipientName$, this is an official notification regarding your organization, identified by the organization number $recipientNumber$. Please take the necessary actions.

401.description: Indicates a missing, invalid or expired authorization header.

403.description: Indicates missing or invalid scope or Platform Access Token.

202.description: The request was accepted and a notification order has been successfully generated.

Location.description: Link to access the newly created notification order.

schema.description: Link to access the newly created notification order.

get.description: Endpoint for retrieving the send status of all email notifications generated by a notification order.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the notification order for which notifications are to be retrieved.

401.description: Indicates a missing, invalid or expired authorization header.

403.description: Indicates missing or invalid scope or Platform Access Token.

200.description: The email notifications were successfully retrieved.

404.description: No order matching the provided ID was found.

post.summary: Creates a new notification order that has one or more reminders.
post.description:
The API will accept the request after some basic validation of the request.
The system will also attempt to verify that it will be possible to fulfill the order.

403.description: Caller is not authorized to access the requested resource

200.description: The notification order was created previously.

499.description: Request terminated - The client disconnected or cancelled the request before the server could complete processing

get.summary: Presents the initial view of the metrics page

post.summary: Gets the metrics for the provided month and year

get.description: Endpoint for retrieving details of a notification order, including its template and recipients.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the notification order for which details are to be retrieved.

401.description: Indicates a missing, invalid or expired authorization header.

403.description: Indicates missing or invalid scope or Platform Access Token.

200.description: The details of the notification order were successfully retrieved.

404.description: No order matching the provided ID was found.

get.summary: Endpoint for retrieving an order by senders reference

403.description: Caller is not authorized to access the requested resource

200.description: The list of notification orders matching the provided senders ref was retrieved successfully

post.description: Endpoint for sending a notification via a selected notification channel to one or more recipient.

emailTemplate.subject: Important notification regarding your organization, $recipientName$
emailTemplate.body: Dear $recipientName$, this is an official notification regarding your organization, identified by the organization number $recipientNumber$. Please take the necessary actions.

smsTemplate.body: Dear $recipientName$, this is an official notification regarding your organization, identified by the organization number $recipientNumber$. Please take the necessary actions.

401.description: Indicates a missing, invalid or expired authorization header.

403.description: Indicates missing or invalid scope or Platform Access Token.

202.description: The request was accepted and a notification order has been successfully generated.

Location.description: Link to access the newly created notification order.

schema.description: Link to access the newly created notification order.

get.description: Endpoint for retrieving the processing status of a notification order, along with a summary of all generated notifications.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the notification order for which status are to be retrieved.

401.description: Indicates a missing, invalid or expired authorization header.

403.description: Indicates missing or invalid scope or Platform Access Token.

200.description: The status of the notification order was successfully retrieved.

404.description: No order matching the provided ID was found.

put.description: Endpoint for stopping the sending of a registered notification order.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the notification order for which notifications are to be cancelled.

401.description: Indicates a missing, invalid or expired authorization header.

403.description: Indicates missing or invalid scope or Platform Access Token.

200.description: The notification order was cancelled. No notifications will be sent.

404.description: No order matching the provided ID was found.

409.description: The order cannot be cancelled due to current processing status.

get.summary: Condition endpoint that returns a send condition response.
Retrieve the delivery manifest for a specific notification order.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier (GUID) of the notification order.

403.description: Caller is not authorized to access the requested resource

404.description: No shipment with the provided identifier was found

200.description: The shipment matching the provided identifier was retrieved successfully

499.description: Request terminated - The client disconnected or cancelled the request

post.description: Endpoint for sending SMS notifications to one or more recipients.

example.body: Dear $recipientName$, this is an official notification regarding your organization, identified by the organization number $recipientNumber$. Please take the necessary actions.

401.description: Indicates a missing, invalid or expired authorization header.

403.description: Indicates missing or invalid scope or Platform Access Token.

202.description: The request was accepted and a notification order has been successfully generated.

Location.description: Link to access the newly created notification order.

schema.description: Link to access the newly created notification order.

get.description: Endpoint for retrieving the send status of all SMS notifications generated by a notification order.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the notification order for which notifications are to be retrieved.

401.description: Indicates a missing, invalid or expired authorization header.

403.description: Indicates missing or invalid scope or Platform Access Token.

200.description: The SMS notifications were successfully retrieved.

404.description: No order matching the provided ID was found.

get.summary: Retrieve an array of order status change history.

parameters.name: seq
parameters.description: The sequence number to start fetching status feed entries from

403.description: Caller is not authorized to access the requested resource

499.description: The operation was cancelled by the caller
